trans-unit.source: An <see langword="interface" /> that defines the contract that an Xml dictionary must implement to be used by <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> and <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> implementations.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="interface" />，定義 Xml 字典必須實作供 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> 實作 (Implementation) 使用的合約。

trans-unit.source: This `interface` is implemented by <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionary>, which is used in [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] to optimize the performance of serialization and deserialization of XML messages.
trans-unit.target: 這個 `interface` 是由 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionary> 實作，而這個字典在 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 中是用來最佳化 XML 訊息的序列化 (Serialization) 和還原序列化 (Deserialization) 效能。

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface to provide custom <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString> management.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個介面，即可提供自訂的 <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString> 管理。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to look up an entry in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在字典中查詢項目。

trans-unit.source: This method avoids throwing an exception if the entry is not currently in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 當項目目前不在字典中時，這個方法可以避免擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If <c>key</c> is defined, the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> that is mapped to the key; otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>key</c> 已定義，則為對應到此索引鍵的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" />；否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to look up an entry in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在字典中查詢項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if key is in the dictionary, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引鍵存在於字典中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" />, if found; otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則為對應的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" />，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Checks the dictionary for a specified string value.
trans-unit.target: 檢查字典是否有指定的字串值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if value is in the dictionary, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個值存在於字典中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The matching <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" />, if found; otherwise <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有找到，則為相符的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" />，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Checks the dictionary for a specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" />.
trans-unit.target: 檢查字典是否有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" /> is in the dictionary, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 存在於字典中，則為 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
